Notes

Gatefold sleeve with a clear braille sticker stuck on the front top right corner. It reads "bo(ar)ds (of) canada", the 'ar' and 'of' are represented by one character in braille. Some copies do not have the braille sticker. They have a sticker on the outside of the shrinkwrap that reads: "Boards Of Canada 2LP vinyl repress Includes download card & exclusive sticker" Release comes with MP3 download code and sticker. ℗ 1998 Warp Records Limited. © 2013 Warp Records Limited. All rights [...] reserved [...] Warp Records, P.O. Box 25378, London NW5 1GL. wrap.net/records. Skam Records, PO Box 76, Manchester M45 7XW. skam.co.uk Made in E.U.
